channel.title: Can't buy from a created shop (474)
channel.description:
So I have succesfully made a shop and added items but when I try to buy something, nothing happends. I don't get anything or no message. I can buy from shopkeepers/shopassistans with the id of 520-527 but thoose shops are the only shops I can buy from.
Is there anything I can do so I can buy from other shops?

item.title: Can't buy from a created shop (474)
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

What Source? If it’s Rs2-474 I can help via Skype: Lynxcan

Read full topic

check out those npc ids and see if there is something where it is enabling them to being able to sell items.
